DOC.brief_summary: This study 12-week pilot randomize control trial test feasibility effectiveness home telenutrition weight loss program men West Virginia .
DOC.detailed_description: This study 12-week pilot randomize controlled trial home telenutrition weight loss program men obesity least one additional risk factor cardiovascular disease . The primary aim : 1 . To assess feasibility acceptability male-targeted telenutrition weight loss program term recruitment , retention satisfaction 2 . To evaluate effectiveness telenutrition program compare usual care ( informational ) regard primary secondary outcome measure 12 week . We hypothesize men receive virtual telephonic support register dietitian nutritionist would great weight loss great improvement diet quality men provide educational material .
DOC.criteria: 4070 year old man Body mass index â‰¥ 30 Living spouse companion At least one following : hypertension , diabetes , prediabetes , hypercholesterolemia hypertriglyceridemia A home computer highspeed internet access A telephone health coach phone call Cancer ( except skin prostate ) , celiac disease , bacterial viral infection , renal liver disease ( except nonalcoholic fatty liver disease ) , condition prevents fruit vegetable consumption Major surgery health event ( e.g. , stroke , heart attack ) past six month Taking insulin , antiobesity medication , steroid ( e.g. , Prednisone ) , warfarin ( Coumadin ) Pacemaker defibrillator Currently weight loss diet lose > 10 pound past six month Consume two alcoholic beverage daily
